text: midneun jadeul-iyeo! hananimkke jinsillo nwiuchila, geudaedeul junimkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui aghaeng-eul yongseohae jusigo geudaedeul-eul alaelobuteo gang-i heuleuneun cheongug-e deulge hasiljido moleul il-ila. geunal hananimkkeseoneun seonjijawa geuwa hamkke mid-eossdeon jadeul-ege (buljiog-ui) chiyog-eul juji anh-eusil geos-ila. geudeul-ui apjjoggwa oleunjjog-eneun geudeul-ui bich-i pyeolchyeojil geos-ila. geudeul-i malhal geos-ini : “jeohuiui junim, jeohuileul wihayeo jeohuiui bich-eul wanjeonhi hayeo jusigo jeohuileul yongseohayeo jusibsio. sillo dangsinkkeseoneun modeun geos-i ganeunghan bun-isibnida”
